channel.title: Sick of getting spammed by email?
channel.description:
Ok, say you want to register for a site, but they need your email, but i dont want to give it, i dont want that dam spam, well you dont have to anymore!!
By clicking on the link below, you will be given a temporary e-mail address. Any e-mails sent to that address will show up automatically on the web page. You can read them, click on links, and even reply to them. The e-mail address will expire after 10 minutes.
Why would you use this? Maybe you want to sign up for a site which requires that you provide an e-mail address to send a validation e-mail to. And maybe you don't want to give up your real e-mail address and end up on a bunch of spam lists. This is nice and disposable. And it's free. Enjoy
http://10minutemail.com/10MinuteMail/index.html
I think this was a nice find.

item.title: Sick of getting spammed by email?
item.dc:creator: @aricshow aricshow
item.description:
@aricshow wrote:

oh yea, this is a very useful idea, I will have to use this with sites i don’t want emails from… I have a spam account, but this might be less of a hassle to deal with =)

Thank you all for sharing.

Read full topic
item.source: Sick of getting spammed by email?

heres another 1 ::: http://dodgeit.com/
every1 can read your email that goes there but all u have to do is type in the username u want and its there forever.
its read-only but u can download a rss feed
u can password protect it but u will have to pay money
